title: Pentagon to provide recommendation on transgender troops this week
text:
Pentagon to provide recommendation on transgender troops this week Thursday, February 22, 2018 - 01:19 
U.S. Defense Secretary Jim Mattis will provide his recommendation to President Donald Trump on transgender individuals and military service sometime this week, the Pentagon said on Thursday.   
U.S. Defense Secretary Jim Mattis will provide his recommendation to President Donald Trump on transgender individuals and military service sometime this week, the Pentagon said on Thursday.  //reut.rs/2CD6XOS
